item.title: Duplicating a Schlage Smartlock Key with a Raspberry Pi.
item.author: Author
item.description: Duplicating the key for a Schlage Smartlock for $20 using some off-the-shelf RFID parts, some writable keyfobs, and a Raspberry Pi.
